modName: Reapers CBBE Witch of the Wild
summary: This mod add to the forge Witch of the Wild Outfit for CBBE
descriptionHtml:
Mod Name: Reaper\'s Witch of the Wild CBBE
By: Reaper9111
Version: 1


Description
===========
This mod add to the \"leather\" section of \"Any Forge\" 6 new items... (All Items are Clothes, so have no armor rating) Feel Free to convert the Outfit to Armor, as long as my mod is required, Send me a link, I\'ll upload it here.
- Witch of the Wild Horns (Circlet)
- Witch of the Wild Amulet
- Witch of the Wild Robe
- Witch of the Wild Bracers
- Witch of the Wild Ring
- Witch of the Wild Boots
The Textures are all 100% custom made by myself.
This my \"First\" official 100% New textures release... Don\'t be too harsh on me ;-)
I hope you will like them and endorse it i you do !
This outfit is for CBBE and are for female only ! (it can probably work also with UNP)
It\'s a mashup of this and that as for the model...
Beast race can use it, but it\'s possible that the horns will not display correctly. (the rest should be fine)
Most of these items require only materials only, No perks and such. (Silver ingot, Leather, Leather Staps, Charcoal, Ruby, Horker\'s Tusk)
Please note that the boots & robe \"Inventory model\" are not looking good, but at least it has some !

Here\'s an alternate texture: [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25865/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D25865\"]Retexture by Den987[/url]
Here\'s a version for UNP, and a CBBE Boots fix: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26270
Thanks to SkyrimForDaWin for this.

PLEASE, FEEL FREE TO UPLOAD GOOD SCREENSHOT, i\'m not good at taking great screen !
[youtube]9hfE10BQaWE[/youtube]   [youtube]iBLp8-aKhBw[/youtube]

Required mods
=============
None.


Install
=======
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file from Nexus
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Activates the selected mod\" button.


Manual install
==============
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\:
.- the Meshes folder
.- the Textures folder
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say \"Yes to all\".  


Upgrade
=======
Not aplicable at this time.


Uninstall
=========
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Deactivates the selected mod\" button.


Manual uninstall
================
1. Delete:
.- the folder \\meshes\\that you have previously installed.
.- the folder \\Textures\\that you have previously installed.
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.

Incompatibility
===============
None


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
The Horns (circlet) might not display correctly for beast race.
The boots are clipping a tiny tiny bit... Nothing too serious !

Future plans
============
None


Contact
=======
You can find me on Nexus as: Reaper9111 
You can email me IF i don\'t reply to your message on Nexus: reaper91_11@hotmail.com


Credits
=======
Bethesda
Nexus
Gimp
Nifskope
Nexus Modding community
Reaper9111 (myself) for all the Textures
Caliente             for CBBE base
Fraper              for the Boots model
Kurese              for the horn model
?                   for the robe model (i found this on the net whitout any readme and informations, I\'m not the author of this !
If you know who created it, let me know so i can imediately credit this person.)


Tools Used
==========
GIMP - http://www.gimp.org/
NIFSkope - http://www.niftools.org/
7zip - http://www.7-zip.org/


Licensing/Legal
===============
DO NOT REUPLOAD THIS MOD ANYWHERE !!!
Contact me for anything directly related to this mod.
Remember to ENDORSE the mod if you like it !
author: Reaper9111
